thread.title: A Palatial Celebration Your Wedding at Emirates Palace
thread.title_full: A Palatial Celebration Your Wedding at Emirates Palace | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: A Palatial Celebration Your Wedding at Emirates Palace
text:
(MENAFN Press) Imagine waking up in a palace overlooking the glistening blue waters of the Arabian Gulf, to get ready for your special day within the golden walls of the most spectacular location in Abu Dhabi. Imagine walking under Swarovski chandeliers in your gown to celebrate your fairy tale wedding with your family and friends.

At Emirates Palace, your wedding dreams will become reality. Where royal weddings are the signature, the talented team of professionals promises to plan your perfect wedding. Inspiration is found in every corner of the breath-taking grounds of the Palace, from the glimmering ocean to the ceilings adorned in gold. 

Where space is not an issue, you can build your invitation list to include 30 or 2,000 guests. Create your magical space under the stars in one of the many outdoor Gazebos, on the beach with the breath-taking backdrop of the illuminated Palace, or within the regal glamour of the spacious Ballroom. With a selection of indoor and outdoor venues, there is nothing like a Palace wedding.

Emirates Palace is offering something extra special to couples looking for a summer wedding between June 1st and September 30th. The summer package promises the full royal treatment, including the majestic ballroom for your wedding reception, a classy Rolls Royce for a stately escort from your home to the Palace, the Honeymoon Suite on your wedding night with a private dinner and sumptuous breakfast-in-bed, and a lavish Silver Service Menu starting from AED 350.00 per person.

As an additional touch, with this special offer you can recreate the magic of your special day and return to celebrate your first anniversary with a one-night stay, a gift from Emirates Palace. 

Call today to start making your arrangements at Emirates Palace. For more information or reservations, please call 971 (0) 2 690 7944 or 971 (0) 50 818 0989, or email weddings@emiratespalace.ae
